00007  <? /* Behold... THE LOOP! Look familiar? If you've ever themed Wordpress then it should :) */ ?>
00008  <? if(get('data')->are_categories()): while(get('data')->has_categories()): if(get('data')->are_forums()): ?>
00009 
00010   <h1 class="forum_title"><? get('data')->the_category('title'); ?></h1>
00011   <div class="forum_list">
00012    <div class="forum_list_head">

00015     <div class="forum_list_views">Views</div>
00016     <div class="forum_list_info">Information</div>
00017    </div>
00018    
00019    <? while(get('data')->has_forums()): ?>
00020    <div class="forum_list_wrap">
00021     <div class="forum_list_desc">
00022      <h1><? get('data')->the_forum_link(); ?></h1>
00023      <p><? get('data')->the_forum('description'); ?></p>
00024     </div>
00025     <div class="forum_list_posts"><? get('data')->the_forum('threads'); ?></div>
00026     <div class="forum_list_views"><? get('data')->the_forum('views'); ?></div>
00027     <div class="forum_list_info">
00028     
00029     </div>
00030    </div>
00031    <? endwhile; ?>
00032   </div>
00033  
00034  <? endif; endwhile; endif; ?>
00035  
00036 </div>
00037 
00038 <? get('theme')->include_footer(); ?>
